channel.title: Syllabuses on Basics of data visualization for behavioral scientists

item.title: Syllabus
item.description: Course syllabus Session 1 [21/09/20]: Basics of data wrangling in R Session 2 [23/09/2020]: Plotting and visualizing data in R Session 3 [25/09/2020]: Exploring and communicating patterns in rating data Session 4 [28/09/2020]: Exploring reaction time data Session 5 [30/09/2020]: Communicating patterns in reaction time data
